tool_description: Unleash laughter in your applications with the Joke Box API! Access a vast database of jokes spanning various categories and moods. Easily integrate our API endpoints into your application and bring joy to your users. Choose from four distinct endpoints to personalize the humor experience.
name: Joke Box
title: Joke Box

api_list.name: Jokes by category
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of maximum 20 jokes when you search by query. Provide  the category that you can find from the "Categories" endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://joke-box.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/jokes/DadJokes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "joke-box.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://joke-box.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/jokes/{category}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "joke-box.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Random 'n' jokes
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of jokes based on the count provided as part of the query. Maximum 100 jokes will be returned. You need to provide a number greater than 0.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://joke-box.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/joke/10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "joke-box.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://joke-box.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/joke/{count}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "joke-box.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Joke of the day
api_list.description: Get a random joke every time you access this endpoint (Joke of the day!).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://joke-box.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/jokeoftheday"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "joke-box.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Categories
api_list.description: Endpoint to get a list of all joke categories.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://joke-box.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "joke-box.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
